mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Widely-used vulnerability scanner that competed directly with Qualys' vulnerability scanning capabilities. Nessus was established as a leading vulnerability assessment tool, initially open-source before commercialization.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Widely-used vulnerability scanner competing directly in vulnerability assessment. Nessus was established as the leading vulnerability scanning tool in the market.
